settings.title: Our Promise To You
settings.subtitle: Right Way Safe is committed to providing the necessary PPE, disinfectants, and cleaners for your home and vehicle.

settings.title: Heading
settings.text: Text area can be used for details about blog authors or general information.

settings.newsletter_text: Stay up to date on all new releases, sales, and exciting news!

settings.title: The long and winding road
settings.text: As long as we can remember, we've always been drawn to simplicity, beautiful designs and creating things. Our collections always draw inspiration from this, and the natural beauty in this world. We both come from a design-focused background; jewelry and accessories were always just a hobby. Once we knew that this is what we were passionate about, we realized that this is what we would dedicate our lives to – and we wanted to share it with the world. After several years of hard-work, our dream became a reality and we were able to finally put ourselves and our company out there. Our pieces are meant to be unique and timeless, something that you'll never want to take off and that you can wear your whole life.

settings.title: Our process
settings.subtitle: A walkthrough on creating our engagement rings

settings.text: We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience. By using this site, you agree to its use of cookies.

settings.title: What is your refund policy?
settings.answer:
All products, except for face masks, are eligible for 100% refund, excluding shipping costs. Our refund policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, we cannot offer a refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

View entire refund policy.

settings.title: What is your shipping policy?
settings.answer:
Orders under $30 are shipped with a flat rate fee of $10.00.

Orders above $30 are shipped for FREE.

Please note: we do our best to ship all orders within 1 business day. However, due to COVID-19, we may experience shipping delays.

settings.title: Can I make changes to my order or cancel my order after it has been processed?
settings.answer: Please email us at info@rightwaysafe.com as soon as possible if you would like to cancel or change your order. Our fulfillment center processes orders quickly (usually within a few hours), but we’ll do our best to process your request.

settings.text:
We love hearing from you!

Please fill out the form below if you have any inquiries about our products, returns + exchanges or about your order.

settings.title: We sanitize what other cleaners miss
settings.subtitle: Strong enough to protect your most cherished spaces from the germs other cleaners leave behind.

settings.title: Nitrile Gloves
settings.subtitle: Protect yourself and others from germs on the surfaces you touch

settings.title: Ship From The USA
settings.subheading: All orders are processed within 1 business day. Shipping is 2-5 days depending on location. Discounts or promotional items cannot be combined.

settings.title: THE SMELL THAT TELLS YOU IT IS CLEANING YOUR HOME
settings.text: While other brands give you flowery aroma, we give you an industrial strength  disinfectant for your home that kills the germs other cleaners can miss.

settings.title: CLEANING SUPPLIES FOR PEOPLE WHO CARE HOW THEIR HOME IS CLEANED
settings.text: Our company shares your goal: we want to help provide you with products that clean and disinfect your home to protect the people you care about most.

settings.title: Know It Is Sanitized
settings.subtitle: Protecting your family spaces just got easier. Strong enough to kill household germs other cleaners can miss.
